name: The Promised Garden - WEB
description:
Web version of The Promised Garden.

This version has some shader glitches that the windows executable does not have.

Rain, snow and shadows may not display properly. Some objects may appear drawn above other closer objects.

 INSTRUCTIONS: ---------------------------------

Use the weather to become stronger and find the promised garden.

WASD - move

LEFT mouse click - interact/START.

STATUS: ---------------------------------

Rain and water regenerate you. 

Ice and Snow do damage.

Fire deals 10X damage.

At night insects are more aggressive.

BODY: ---------------------------------

Your roots depend on the type of surface you're stepping in.

Your body depends on the weather status in the air.

You can grow flowers when your body and roots are maxed out.

FIRING: ---------------------------------

Fire flowers with LEFT mouse click. Flowers move to the closest enemy in range.
